data.name: Voltcube
data.detailed_description:
Voltcube is a survival, exploration, and building game centered in a procedurally generated world made out of blocks; this is the kind of open world where you may do pretty much whatever you want; we don't establish walls or restrict you to play by our standards; it's your game, your rules!
Features:
- Explore a dynamic procedurally generated block world
- Build your own creations using the many blocks available in the game
- Explore structures all throughout the world for huge rewards
data.about_the_game:
Voltcube is a survival, exploration, and building game centered in a procedurally generated world made out of blocks; this is the kind of open world where you may do pretty much whatever you want; we don't establish walls or restrict you to play by our standards; it's your game, your rules!
Features:
- Explore a dynamic procedurally generated block world
- Build your own creations using the many blocks available in the game
- Explore structures all throughout the world for huge rewards
data.short_description: A chaotic, procedurally generated, blocky world. Something that is already well known on the internet, but is now different. Survive, create machines explore the world looking for treasures and build everything your imagination allows you to.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 4150
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
